name: Avantek Software
tag_list: nearshore, outsourcing, software-development, mobile, quality-assurance, web-based-applications
overview:
Avantek is a leading provider of software development and quality assurance services in Costa Rica and a key member of the Group Avantica technology companies. We have been developing leading-edge Web, desktop and mobile applications for companies in the US and Latin America for nearly 10 years.

The companyâ€™s methodology, processes and standards are efficiently aligned to deliver high quality projects based on web and mobile technologies. Avantek is also the top employer of qualified and motivated engineering talent in Costa Rica’s cost-effective northern region.

Specialties Software development, quality assurance, mobile development, nearshore, outsourcing, web-based applications, outsourced product development, desktop applications, mobile applications, software integration.
